headline: FDA Approves Biogen, Eisai's Highly Anticipated Alzheimer's Treatment
summary: Biogen and Eisai won Food and Drug Administration approval of an at-home shot version of their Alzheimer's treatment Leqembi.

raw.headline: FDA Approves Biogen, Eisai's Highly Anticipated Alzheimer's Treatment
raw.summary: Biogen and Eisai won Food and Drug Administration approval of an at-home shot version of their Alzheimer's treatment Leqembi.

headline: FDA Approves LEQEMBI® IQLIK™ (lecanemab-irmb) Subcutaneous Injection for Maintenance Dosing for the Treatment of Early Alzheimer's Disease
summary: Eisai Co., Ltd. (Headquarters: Tokyo, CEO: Haruo Naito, "Eisai") and Biogen Inc. (Nasdaq: BIIB, Headquarters: Cambridge, Massachusetts, CEO: Christopher A. Viehbacher, "Biogen") announced today that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved the Biologics License Application (BLA) for once weekly lecanemab-irmb subcutaneous injection (U.S. brand name: LEQEMBI® IQLIKTM, pronounced "I Click") for maintenance dosing. LEQEMBI IQLIK is a subcutaneous autoinjector (SC-AI) developed by Ei
